titleInfo.title: Keith Urban & Vince Gill at the Bridgestone Arena

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, black and green on white) announcing All for the Hall with Keith Urban, Vince Gill, Rascal Flatts, Lady Antebellum, Alabama, Alison Krauss and the Union Station, Pistol Annies, the Band Perry, the Oak Ridge Boys, Little Big Town, Thompson Square, Diamond Rio, Exile, and the Blue Sky Riders at the Bridgestone Arena on April 10. Event benefits the County Music Hall of Fame and Museum.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
